00008 # iterate trough the templates
00009 $iterator = $pom->getTemplateByTitle("Post")->listIterator();
00010 while($iterator->hasNext()){
00011         $template = &$iterator->getNextNodeValueByReference(); # get reference for direct changes
00012         if($template->getParameter("PARAMETERNAME")!== NULL){
00013                 # check if the parameter exists
00014                 if ($template->getParameter("PARAMETERNAME")->getValue()->getElement() !==  NULL){ # a parameter value exists
00015                         # get the first subelement of the page object representing the parameter value
00016                         var_dump($template->getParameter("PARAMETERNAME"));
00017                         $anElement = &$template->getParameter("PARAMETERNAME")->getValueByReference()->getElement();
00018                         var_dump($anElement);
00019                 }else{
00020                         # add a new text element
00021                         $parameterValue = &$template->getParameter("PARAMETERNAME")->getValueByReference();
00022                         $simpleText = new POMSimpleText("A simple text element!");
00023                         $parameterValue->addElement($simpleText);
00024                         # show the changes                      
00025                         $pom->sync();
